SELECT ? AS one FROM "ip_blocks" WHERE "ip_blocks"."severity" = $? AND (ip >>= ?) LIMIT $?
SELECT ? AS one FROM "oauth_applications" WHERE "oauth_applications"."uid" = $? LIMIT $?
SELECT "settings".* FROM "settings" WHERE (thing_type is ? and thing_id is ?) AND "settings"."var" = $? ORDER BY "settings"."id" ASC LIMIT $?
